#include <stdio.h>
 
int main () {
  int i ;
  char arr[1001] ;
  char freq[26] = {0} ;
  gets (arr);
  for ( i = 0 ; arr[i] != ' ' ; i ++ )
    freq[arr[i]-'a'] ++ ;
  for ( ; arr[i] != '\0' ; i ++ )
    freq[arr[i]-'a'] = 0 ;
  for ( i = 0 ; i < 26 ; i ++ )
    if ( freq[i] != 0 )
      printf ( "%c%d" , i+'a', freq[i] ) ;
  return 0;
}
